name: skraafoto-saul
description: This is a collection of stand-alone methods for photogrammetry calculations and API interactions for 'Danske Skråfotos'.

scripts.test: echo 'TESTS WILL ONLY RUN UNDER NODE v18' && node ./test/saul-projection.test.js && node ./test/saul-core.test.js
